Sample Text Document

This is a test document for the PII Anonymizer browser application.

Contact Information:
- Name: Hans Müller
- Email: hans.mueller@example.ch
- Phone: +41 79 123 45 67
- Address: Bahnhofstrasse 42, 8001 Zürich

The document contains various PII elements that should be detected
and anonymized before being processed by an LLM.

Special characters test: äöü ß éèê çñ
Unicode test: 日本語 中文 한국어
